greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Permutation of natural numbers induced when A091205 is restricted to {1} and binary codes for polynomials reducible over GF(2): a(1) = 1, a(n) = A062298(A091205(A091242(n-1))).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10001
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
formula: As a composition of related permutations:
program: isA014580(n)=polisirreducible(Pol(binary(n))*Mod(1, 2)); \\ This function from _Charles R Greathouse IV_

A091205(n) = if(n<=1, n, if(isA014580(n), prime(A091205(A091226(n))), {my(irfs, t); irfs=subst(lift(factor(Mod(1, 2)*Pol(binary(n)))), x, 2); irfs[,1]=apply(t->A091205(t), irfs[,1]); factorback(irfs)}));
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Aug 16 2014
